citations.narrative:
The facility's annual report for fiscal year 2024, which was due to the Deputy Administrator on or before December 1st,
2024, was not submitted. Annual reports from 2021, 2022, and 2023 were also not received by the required deadline. In
order to assure that professionally acceptable standards governing the care and use of animals are followed, each
reporting facility shall submit an annual report covering the use of live animals in the previous federal fiscal year on or
before December 1st of each calendar year.
The Annual Report of Research Facility (APHIS Form 7023), Continuation Sheet for Annual Report of Research Facility
(APHIS Form 7023A), and Annual Report of Research Facility Column E Explanation (APHIS Form 7023B) are forms
which may be used to submit the information required by paragraph (b) of this section.

A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 10:45 am on
3/4/2025. The inspector attempted to contact the licensee/registrant by Cell phone call with voicemail, text, knocked on
door, honked car horn. Failure to provide access to the facility, animals, and records for inspection is a serious violation of
the AWA and regulations. Failure to comply may result in enforcement action.
End Section

narrative:
2.36(a)  Repeat
   
Annual report. 
The facility's annual report for fiscal year 2024, which was due to the Deputy Administrator on or before December 1st, 
2024, was not submitted. Annual reports from 2021, 2022, and 2023 were also not received by the required deadline. In 
order to assure that professionally acceptable standards governing the care and use of animals are followed, each 
reporting facility shall submit an annual report covering the use of live animals in the previous federal fiscal year on or 
before December 1st of each calendar year. 
 
The Annual Report of Research Facility (APHIS Form 7023), Continuation Sheet for Annual Report of Research Facility 
(APHIS Form 7023A), and Annual Report of Research Facility Column E Explanation (APHIS Form 7023B) are forms 
which may be used to submit the information required by paragraph (b) of this section. 
2.38(b) 
   
Miscellaneous. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 10:45 am on 
3/4/2025. The inspector attempted to contact the licensee/registrant by Cell phone call with voicemail, text, knocked on 
door, honked car horn. Failure to provide access to the facility, animals, and records for inspection is a serious violation of 
the AWA and regulations. Failure to comply may result in enforcement action. 
 
 
End Section
